version_description:
Welcome to The Great Courses 2.0! You've always been able to stream over 8,000 videos and lectures taught by the top professors in the world, but now we've updated the app to give you the ability to download and view them offline! We've also allowed all users to register for a free trial and to purchase their subscription within the app!
And we have added a My History section where you can see your recent viewing history and resume playing lectures that you started.
Download our updated app and get started today!

We’ve added audio streaming! This new feature allows you to move back and forth between audio and video without missing a word. Use audio streaming to learn through listening, but enjoy the freedom of switching over to video to gain visual context whenever you need it, without interrupting your experience.

Speed Controls for Audio and Video. Adjust your lecture speed from .5X to 2X.

Fixes for iOS 11.

We've updated our App! A new look and feel awaits you along with several enhancements:
- Audio downloads - you can now download a lecture in either Video or Audio format
- New bottom navigation - this will now help users easily navigate the content on the App. Watchlist, Categories, Downloads & Settings are all one tap away
- Our Guidebooks are now available within The Great Courses Plus apps. These are .pdf files associated with every course.
Further, these Guidebooks are now Interactive, users can now highlight, make notes and bookmark specific content within the Guidebooks
- Updated platform that provides a more reliable user experience
